resources.string: \ This game is played just like regular Tic Tac Toe with one difference: to win a tile you have to win a smaller game of Tic Tac Toe inside that tile.\n\ \n\ A tie happens when there are no further moves. In the case of a tie in a small board, that will count as a win for both sides in the larger game.

\ This Word Game Consists of 9X9 Grids in which player has to enter words greater than 3 letters.The Main Target is to find the longest word in each grid.\n\ \n\ The time stamp is 3 minutes.In the Phase-I the time is limited to 2 minutes and in Phase-II the Time is 1 minute.
